description: A modern take on a retro classic, this curried rice and cauliflower salad is perfect for an alfresco feast. It's vegetarian and gluten free so everyone can dig in.
name: Layered Curried Rice & Cauliflower Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon rice mixture into a 12cup capacity flat-based bowl. Layer with tomato, half the spinach and cauliflower. Top with remaining spinach, dollop with yoghurt and scatter over pistachios to serve.
Spoon rice mixture into a 12cup capacity flat-based bowl. Layer with tomato, half the spinach and cauliflower. Top with remaining spinach, dollop with yoghurt and scatter over pistachios to serve.
